problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I was sitting alone in the cafeteria when a Moldovan guy and a Sri Lankan guy sat down on either side of me. I had to angle myself towards the Moldovan guy because the other clearly hadn't put on any deodorant that day.
Question: Who smells bad?
ans0: Cannot be determined
ans1: The Moldovan guy
ans2: The Sri Lankan guy
